I bought this corset as part of a vampire costume for Halloween. I’m 5’7, 160 lbs, B cup bra and wearing a size M. The only downside to this top I would say is that if your arms are muscular/bigger like mine, the sleeves will be restricting and you won’t be able to lift them or move them around very much at all. I was able to fix this by stretching my arms and thus stretching the material out some. Even then I still couldn’t reach them over my head but it was comfortable enough to still wear it. I would have given this product 5 stars otherwise, but yes, super cute and absolutely recommend, especially if your arms are in the skinnier side.
